Text: FW JCB Training for Rail Section OperatorsMickRichard Can you advise me on the current situation with regard to this training requirement so the training records can be kept upto date Regards Terry Original Message From Rogers Richard Sent January To Mussett Mick Cc Bye Terry Subject JCB Training for Rail Section Operators Mick The following people require training in the operation of the JCB bucket loader RRogers DClapton MDixon CWilson CCallaghan Can you please liase with me to organise training when convenient for yourselvesIf possible we would like to get DClapton trained this ThursFriday as BJohnson finishes this Saturday th Jan Thank You Richard
